name: Chorus
description: We are Chorus, a Microsoft Gold Partner based near Bristol specialising in IT Managed services, Office 365, Microsoft Dynamics 365, SharePoint, Umbraco and website development and creative services. Founded in 1999, we have an extremely talented team with a wealth of expertise and experience within the IT industry. We believe that great technology enables businesses to grow quickly and sustainably, and it is our aim to help businesses achieve this through reliable and robust technology.
